input.sentences: while looking for a new house we visited many neighborhoods .
this one was one of our favorites because of how spacious it was .
we really enjoyed the architecture of this house | but it was a little too expensive for us .
this house had a great location and was in the heart of the city .
we finally decided on this house | which was the perfect blend of size and looks .
output.sentences: While I walked the countryside I imagined the story of some of the buildings I passed along my route,stone buildings can be very special and evoke some powerful emotions.
You could look at a stone building and see a school or a hospital that once was.
You could look at a building with turrets and dream of a princess who might have cried to be left go.
You could look at a building and see the color and that might evoke some thoughts, was this a place where George Washington might have slept ?
Looking at a tutor home, has a sense of gothic background maybe this is a place where black magic and sorcercery once were found.
